attributes.action: that Miss Kylie Ann Minogue O.B.E should be given the power and influence to be a secure real Surviving Cancer Icon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
She is now considered to be a Surviving Cancer Icon


Please remember Kylie is recovering from the 18 month psychological battle against cancer.

Kylie the Surviving Cancer Icon
She needs to have happy life outside the context of her job titles.

Many relatives around the world of surviving cancer need to know they can have a long and happy life for real.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting the PM do.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
